summary_short: Dmitri Karamazov is the most connected figure (74 ties). Key relationship types: financial relationship.
highlights: Most central: Dmitri Karamazov (74), Alyosha Karamazov (65), Fyodor Karamazov (40), Ivan Karamazov (31)
story_summary: Mitya confesses to having stolen fifteen hundred roubles from Katerina Ivanovna a month ago, which he kept sewn in a rag around his neck and only spent the money the day before. He explains his shame and internal struggle over hiding the money and his feelings of being a thief, revealing his conflicted motives and despair. After his confession, the prosecutor questions him about the details, and despite Mitya's exhaustion and hopelessness, they prepare to examine witnesses while sharing tea.
evidence_quotes: "That money was my own, my own, that is, stolen by me ..."
"Every day that I had that fifteen hundred sewn up round my neck, every day and every hour I said to myself, ‘You’re a thief! you’re a thief!’"
